basics.label: President
basics.summary: Creative Marketing Professional with an MBA seeking a new challenge after many years as a stay at home mom; broad-based background in highly competitive and dynamic organizations. Recognized as a decisive leader and excellent team player.

highlights: Awarded Contract with Southern U. S. Trade Association to implement a Canadian/US Trade Mission.
Negotiated on behalf of buyer/sellers for several large bulk commodity export transactions.
